brief: This command deletes an IPv6 shared network from the configuration database.
cmd-comment: This command includes a list with exactly one name of the shared network to be deleted. The ``subnets-action`` parameter indicates whether the subnets in this shared network should be deleted. The ``server-tags`` parameter must not be specified for this command.
cmd-syntax: <specification of the database to connect to>
name: remote-network6-del
